citation: Proclamation under the Burial and Cremation Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Burial and Cremation Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Burial and Cremation Act 2002 fix 1 July 2002 as the day on which that Act commences.

21 June 2002

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. BACON

Premier

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
